term.title: acceptance interval

item.text: Interval of permissible measured quantity values.

notes.item: Unless otherwise stated in the specification, the acceptance limits belong to the acceptance interval.
An acceptance interval is termed an "acceptance zone" in the Eurachem guide on compliance assessment.

sources.item: PAC, 2021, 93, 997. 'Metrological and quality concepts in analytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 2021)' on page 1019 (https://doi.org/10.1515/pac-2019-0819)
